string.name: name
string.value: Permission to Join the Secret Organization
The #p1063018# starts talking to you. Have you finally been allowed to join the organization that #p1063018#'s master is in? Respond to the #b#p1063018##k.

The #p1063018# says that he hasn't been able to contact you sooner because his master is in a precarious situation and has been on the run. He says that you'll be able to join the Secret Organization as a temporary member. Go to the #b#m200080601##k in #b#m200080600##k. He says that it's the room with a #bwing-shaped sign#k on the entrance...
You went into the secret room that the #p1063018# mentioned and searched behind the #p2012034#.

Hello, lifesaver! Long time no see! I'm sorry I couldn't contact you earlier. My master has been very busy... To tell you the truth, my master was fighting against his enemy and got himself in trouble, so he's running away. I think he's safe for now, though.

Oh, but that's not why you're here. Congratulations! You have been approved to join the secret organization! More accurately, you're a temporary member of the organization, but you will soon be promoted and become an official member like my master!

I don't know what kind of tasks you will be given, lifesaver. If you wish to receive a mission as a member of the secret organization, go to the #b#m200080601##k in #b#m200080600##k. If you look in the #b#p2012034##k, you'll be able to view the mission you have been given.

It's really hidden, isn't it? That's how the organization delivers its missions. Once you get promoted, you'll be able to meet with other members and decide on the missions you want to accept, like my master.
Huh? Don't you approve of the way you receive missions? But it's a secret organization and everything must be done discreetly...
#b(Could this be the #p2012034# the #p1063018# was talking about? This brick that's popping out appears to be movable. Try picking up the brick.)#k
#b(A medal came out along with the brick! Something else might be in there...)#k
Have you forgotten where to go? Just find #b#m200080601##k.
